SELECT X.rnum, X.CLASS_NO, X.CLASS_TITLE, X.CLASS_DESC, X.CLASS_LOC, X.CLASS_CATEGORY, X.CLASS_PRICE, X.CLASS_SALE, X.MEMBER_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.CLASS_NO, A.CLASS_TITLE, A.CLASS_DESC, A.CLASS_LOC, A.CLASS_CATEGORY, A.CLASS_PRICE, A.CLASS_SALE, A.MEMBER_ID FROM ( SELECT C.CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_TITLE, C.CLASS_DESC, C.CLASS_LOC, C.CLASS_CATEGORY, C.CLASS_PRICE, C.CLASS_SALE, C.MEMBER_ID FROM CLASS c ORDER BY CLASS_NO DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageEnd} ) X WHERE X.rnum >= #{pageBegin}

SELECT X.CLASS_NO, X.CLASS_TITLE , X.CLASS_PRICE, X.FILE_NEW_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum,A.avg,A.CLASS_TITLE, A.CLASS_NO, A.CLASS_PRICE , A.FILE_NEW_NAME FROM( SELECT AVG(R.REVIEW_RATE) AS avg, C.CLASS_TITLE, C.CLASS_NO , C.CLASS_PRICE , F.FILE_NEW_NAME FROM CLASS C, REVIEW R, FILE_TABLE F WHERE C.CLASS_NO = R.CLASS_NO AND F.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO AND F.FILE_ORI_NAME = 'thumbnail' GROUP BY C.CLASS_TITLE, C.CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_PRICE, F.FILE_NEW_NAME ORDER BY avg desc )A WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 ) X WHERE X.rnum >= 1
SELECT F.FILE_NEW_NAME FROM CLASS C, FILE_TABLE F WHERE C.CLASS_NO = F.CLASS_NO AND C.CLASS_NO = #{class_no} AND F.FILE_ORI_NAME != 'thumbnail'
